messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
When I toss this coin, you call it.
Heads, we battle.Tails, we battle!Now, how will this play out, my friend?
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
The coin came up tails, and like it, my
Pokémon is facedown...
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
I flipped a coin when I was ten.
I decided to live in Sinnoh then.
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
Luck wasn’t with me last time, but I’m
feeling good about this. My lucky coin tells me so!
